website_summaries.verdict: For anyone concerned with using natural products, this volumizing mascara is a great addition to a toxin-free beauty routine.
pros: Organic formula is one wearers can feel good about, while ensuring volume and desired results
Hypoallergenic formula is perfect for those with sensitivities to chemicals
Easy to remove with cleanser and does not clump
cons: Provides wonderful volume but doesn’t aid in lash thickness as much as others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Gummy/gloppy on the brush and clumps on eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this ... read the reviews and it seemed it was everything I was looking for. It doesn't bother my eyes (I have extremely sensitive eyes), it has a very low and unobjectionable odor (and an extremely sensitive sense of smell) ... it is just very gummy coming out of the tube, clumps/globs on the brush and doesn't transfer suitably to my eyelashes. I even tried using it with disposable mascara brushes and that didn't work well either. A lot of money wasted ... too expensive to toss so I will try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy V.

customer_reviews.title: Great natural mascara
customer_reviews.text: I've been usin this a couple weeks now, and it does an amazing job giving me longer lashes, but not necessarily thicker lashes. Either way, this stuff feels good on my lashes and I love that it's natural.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJoyL

customer_reviews.title: safe for my contact allergies
customer_reviews.text: I have severe contact allergies to certain chemicals so I bought this mascara (with all safe ingredients for me) HOPING that it wouldn't suck and that I would be able to wear mascara again. It doesn't suck!!! I wear it every day. One tube lasts me 2-3 months and it looks great. As good as the Benefit mascara I had been using for years. I will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: Lengthening, curling, volumizing mascara!
customer_reviews.text: After years of searching for the perfect mascara, I have found it! This mascara makes my eyelashes look longer, curls them without needing a curler, and volumizes all in one. I have very sensitive eyes and have not had any sensitivity. This has not come off with water, yet is removed easily with makeup remover. You can wear it for a more natural and elegant look with a single coat for tint and slight definition. Two coats with 30 seconds in between provides volume without any of the spidery look or clumps most other mascaras give. I have spent upwards of $30 on brand name mascaras only to be disappointed and so happy I found this one!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara for sensitive eyes, good ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried just about every mascara on the market, I have sensitive eyes. This product does not irritate them. It goes on well, does not clump or leave you with raccoon eyes at the end of the day. It is easy to remove. I also wanted a product that would be good for my eye lashes since they are small and falling out, this product fits the bill. I like the ingredients in this product since I am changing to more natural products. I can get some length from using this product but can not get thicker fuller lashes from it. Guess can't have everything. All in all I am happy with this product and will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee P.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: This product was hard to put on and kind of goopy, and then little black flakes of it kept falling into my eyes all day!!! I hated it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My eyes get red and itchy after using this “natural” mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Moskalyuk

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a lot of eye sensitivity problems with the mascaras I was trying. So I decided to bite-the-bullet and pay this ridiculous price hoping I would "get what I paid for". Well, that didn't happen. Since then, however, I have found a mascara that works and I have not had itchy eyes since then. For those of you who are about to "bite-the-bullet" you might want to try Almay Multi-benefit mascara first -- it's hypoallergenic and it works! I bought mine at the grocery store, but you can buy it at Amazon for less than I paid -- $5.59.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural = Great -  But still clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this is an all natural product... and I also love the dark color. But it seems to clump just as much as any other mascara I've tried. I have to continually scrape extra mascara off of the brush so that I won't have thick goopy lashes. A bit disappointed and don't know that I'll buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lashes  without harmful chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This mascara does exactly what it says it does. It adds volume and length without clumping. My favorite thing is it actually holds a curl! I have naturally very straight eyelashes and this is one of the few natural mascaras that actually keeps them curled! It's also pretty waterproof, lasting through some sweaty workouts with no smudging but is easily removed at the end of the day! The only con is its a bit pricy but it works amazingly well and has such great ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie Schneider

customer_reviews.title: I do not like a heavy dark mascara and this just makes my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! After just one use I am sold. I have not been able to wear mascara without irritation since my cataract surgery and this product has solved my problem. I do not like a heavy dark mascara and this just makes my brown lashes look fuller and longer but very natural. Went on easily, no flaking or smudges. Looked freshly applied at the end of the day. Thank you so much for developing this.
customer_reviews.author: Constance B.

customer_reviews.title: Smudgy
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got an old one or what but it was clumpy and smudged w/o me touching it. I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: T in midwest

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product was a real disappointment. It was super thick and made my lashes look clumpy. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is the best ever! I've tried all types and was using Clinique for many years but me eyes were always tired and burning. I do have dry eye but other mascaras made it worse. Skin2spirit does not irritate at all. I can use it daily and have no sensitivity to it. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is it has a tendency to melt a little when I am somewhere hot, or at the end of a long and tiring day. Otherwise, no irritation or sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: G-MA

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes, but not the thickest coat
customer_reviews.text: I love having a thick coat of mascara on my eye lashes as much as anyone else.. it's fun and eye catching! But not when you have sensitive eyes and they get really dry the same day, and then puffy the next day! I tried a few hypoallergenic mascaras that were so thin they were practically invisible. With this one, I've had no reaction - no dry eyes and no puffiness the next day, and it's much thicker and more visible than any other hypoallergenic mascara I have tried. So, until or unless I find something better, this is the one for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best non toxic mascara on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this product and use it almost daily. I tried several other non-toxic mascaras and this one is the closest one that I found two what would be considered a normal mascara. It adds length and depth and shade to the Lash and isn't thin and watery like the other brands. It doesn't flake and is also easy to remove
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My eyes feel healthy and are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my eyelashes, no smearing and comes off easily with warm soapy water. Rub gently....I was not and lost a few eyelashes. The main reason I like this product is my eyes are safe and beautiful no irritation, does not cause my eyelid to swell and no itching. I am so happy to find this product. It is very black.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dee

customer_reviews.title: Natural look
customer_reviews.text: This is not a volumizing/lengthening mascara. One application gives a very natural look and makes the lashes more visible without clumping or lashes sticking together - nice for everyday/daytime. It also did not irritate my eyes. However, I did not have great results when I tried to apply 2 and 3 coats for an evening look as the mascara did start to clump and the lashes to stick together - which isn't a look I like.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara I Have Used in over 55 years
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid. Afraid it would irritate my eyes. Afraid I would have to use mascara over this one because my eye lashes are a light brown. But it is wonderful. Goes on nicely without clumping. Two or three single stroke coats and my lashes looked better than they have in years.I allowed a little time between coats. My natural lashes are fairly long for an older woman so sometimes with some brands I have had smugging under my eyes--raccoon eyes. I wore this mascara over 12 hours on Sunday and it was still perfect. Even in 92 degree heat in AZ.
customer_reviews.author: JanJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Worst Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This natural mascara is very irritating!!! The reason I purchased it was I wanted to try a organic mascara. My eyes were watering and became very red. I couldn’t wait to wash my face and remove the mascara,I took it off and woke up the next morning and my eyes were still irate. I regret trying this mascara!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue

customer_reviews.title: The only suggestion I have is that the mascara came with a better application brush that separated lashes better
customer_reviews.text: I will buy this product again. It wears well and stays on all day. This is very hard to find in organic mascara. I use another mascara brush to separate lashes and take away any clumping. The only suggestion I have is that the mascara came with a better application brush that separated lashes better.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Finally a mascara I can use!
customer_reviews.text: I am so unbelievably impressed with this mascara. First of all, the customer service is top notch! I have VERY sensitive eyes and even the almay/physician formula/clinique mascaras irritated me. This one I have no reaction at all. it didn't clump or flake at all. so those people that said this, either applied too much or just didn't wait until the first coat dried to apply the second. If your iffy with mascaras but love them, this is the one to try. trust me!!
customer_reviews.author: ElianaLuz

customer_reviews.title: Good Natural Mascara
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I decided to try this. I am pleased with my purchase. It does not irritate my eyes, and it appears to made of the good stuff, not nasty chemicals. I was hoping it would be rated on EWG, but it's o.k. I think the only wish I have is that I would not have to apply so many layers. I don't mind too much, but am sometimes in a huge hurry. I would recommend this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid1221

customer_reviews.title: TOO CLUMPY
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake. I bought this for my girlfriend and she loves it but her "biggest disappointment is that it's too clumpy".
customer_reviews.author: An AMERICAN SHEEPDOG

customer_reviews.title: Needs a different brush
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product because I am trying to switch to all natural products. I love that this is all natural. The size is a little small. It feels very smooth when you put it on, however the brush should be changed. I have to wipe the brush on the top of the container before putting it on, otherwise my lashes will be all clumped together. Even after wiping the excess off, I still have to go through with tweezers to remove some clumping. It takes a little extra time using this mascara, but overall it is a good product. Lashes do look great when you are done. I would probably purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago I developed a sensitivity toward many mascaras making it impossible for me to wear any of them. I constantly had to remove them soon after applying so I gave up. Recently I thought I would try to find one again and came across this brand and after reading the reviews decided to try it. I can't believe that I can wear this without having to remove it for the whole day! I have been using it for several months now without any issues. So happy I tried it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I thought and made my eyelashes look average. For the price and reviews I was expecting an awesome mascara but it was very average.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This mascara doesn't make my eyes red
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy to have found this product line -- I also bought their eyeliner. I have not been able to wear eye make-up for the past 5 years, having developed some kind of allergy. No doctor was able to figure out what ingredients in the other eyeliners and mascaras was causing the allergic reaction. So I have been looking and looking to find something I can wear. Just found this and so far no allergic reaction at all - eyes are clear, no stinging effect, no eye pain. Truly amazing -- not sure what they are putting (or not putting) in their products, but the result is I can wear mascara and eyeliner again - very good news.
customer_reviews.author: Hampton Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara EVER...
customer_reviews.text: I give you a 5 star review for your mascara. I am 68 years old and have been using mascara for a least 55 years. I believe this has to be the BEST mascara I have ever used. I appreciate the ingredients since I am a real "organic, healthy" person. I took a chance ordering my first tube of mascara months ago and happy at my choice. I now have received my second tube and will be ordering more every 3 to 4 months. I highly recommend your mascara to anyone who loves expressing their eyes with mascara. Thank you for your product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mccloud Watte

customer_reviews.title: A little too heavy--or maybe just a bad applicator
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mascara after reading reviews but unfortunately I'm not really impressed. First, i have fairly long thick lashes. I mainly use mascara to give them definition and keep them in line so i tend to like lighter formulas. I used to use Bare Minerals Flawless Definition but they discontinued it. With this mascara i get too many clumps. I just think the applicator is too thick and doesn't distribute well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: A natural mascara that works
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it was like the rest of the natural mascaras - weak brush, doesn’t glide on that much, smudgy, but was I proven wrong. Total opposite. The applicator is amazing and I was out in a event for 7+ hours with no irritation, no smearing, no nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I only buy makeup not tested on animals, and I’ve tried quite a few mascaras. This one is by far the best. It’s great! My only concern is that it’s a little high priced. It reminds me of my old favorite, Estée Lauder mascara that I don’t buy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the mascara itself, it's the applicator brush that I don't love. I've been using mascara with a silicone brush for the last five years, and I can't get as close to the lash line with the spiral bristle without smudging it somewhere. That's my only complaint. Formula works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: it really is hypo allergenic!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to wear mascara for the last 5 years without getting very itchy and sore eyes. I have tried several different kinds of hypoallergenic ones over the last few years, some of them being very expensive, and never had much luck with them... even wearing only for special occasions, I would get reactions within 3 to 4 hours. This is the first one that I have tried that I lasted 8-10 hours without pain and itchiness... I still only wear for special occasions.... but I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: garden girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a natural mascara that I feel good about using and at the same time gives me the long-lasting wear I require. I find that I need to apply this twice to get the desired affect, but that isn't an issue. I wear safety glasses at work and by mid-morning with other mascaras they had started to flake or leave black smudges under my eyes. This mascara does neither of those things. It wears all day long and still looks good when I go home from work. This product didn't disappoint as others have.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Burn My Eyes !
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of the gunky eyelashes. This makes the eyelashes pretty if allowed to dry before touching up with the second coat. It will smear, being a thin substance, so be careful when applying. I have had new lens replacement in both eyes, and have to be very careful about shedding mascara. I wish it came in Black/ Brown. It arrives in a small tube, but this mascara doesn't require a lot . If you want a lot of mascara on your lashes, go for a cheaper brand. I will probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I Never Thought I’d Leave a Review Like This
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the healthcare industry and during this Covid 19 pandemic, I have to wear an “N95 approved” face mask. I made the mistake of wearing makeup the first week, but it got on the inside of my mask. The second week - no makeup, but the third week, I was feeling a little tired and defeated. Then I thought... since the only part of my face that is visible are my eyes, I’ll try out my new mascara. It worked out great! My eyes popped! No clumps or sensitivity. AND, I felt “pretty” again, like my eyes were “smiling” at the patients. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara, for a Natural Look.
customer_reviews.text: The wand is 2-1/4" long (excluding the cap) and easy to maneuver. Mascara glides on well, thickens the lashes in a natural (not dramatic/fake) way and does not clump or smudge. I did notice, however, that it has a strongish smell, which surprised me for a natural product but it didn't cause me to tear. Product comes with an expiry date on the bottom, which is a plus if you wish to buy a few at a time and keep one for later unused. The one I opened lasted for a good 6 months without getting hard. I will definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite natural mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently made the switch to all natural/ mostly all natural products. I have tried other mascaras and I must say this one is my favorite so far. It goes on very smooth, but maybe slightly too smooth. It is not as thick as your typical mascara you would buy from the store. This in combination with an eyelash curler leaves my eyelashes looking long and not clumpy. Honestly, this product was better than I expected. I plan to continue using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The only natural mascara I will ever use!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different "all natural" mascaras in my time, but this one is the best I have found....by far! What I like most about this one is that it gives lots and lots of volume, as much, or more than cosmetic mascaras. Most "all natural" mascaras go on thin with little thickness, but this one goes on thick and stays on all day and doesn't smear or wear off as the day goes on, plus... my eye lashes don't feel heavy or weighed down. It just makes my eyes feel good and look good...all day long! I love this mascara... it's the only one I will ever want to use. Thank you....Natural Mineral Mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Very dry
customer_reviews.text: This stuff flakes right out of the tube. It is very dry & does not go on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful application & good for my skin!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t expect this to be waterproof or as smudge-proof like its non organic peers. I was only looking for something that I could remove at the end of the day without tearing my eyelashes out, and that wasn’t toxic. It also applies beautifully. Highly recommend to anyone who wants an organic based mascara— it’s worth the extra money to keep your skin and eyes safe. I gave it a 4/5 for smudge proof because although it’s not 100%, it dries quickly after application and required a cloth to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: No need to read another review. I rarely write a review because rarely do a product blow me away. I had all but given up on wearing mascara, honestly I haven’t worn it in a year. I have really missed it but my eyes just couldn’t handle the pain. I have tried the most expensive products and haven’t received the results I have with this mascara. My eyes can’t even tell it’s on. No hurting, blood shot, burning, achey eyes 👀!!!! I am THRILLED with the mascara!! It has given me confidence and hope! BUY THIS MASCARA!
customer_reviews.author: MMT

customer_reviews.title: Made with a preservative.
customer_reviews.text: It’s made with a preservative, which gave me a reaction. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Not hard on eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for anyone who has thinning lashes. This product not only made them look thicker but they seem to be getting healthier all the time. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential part of my makeup routine
customer_reviews.text: I use this mascara for a base coat in the day as it gets all of my fine sparse hairs without extra globbed on. For a night look, I use this only as it is a really good true black and it is gentle on my lashes. I am also able to show the full length of my sparse lashes without many, many coats. This is definitely a part of my morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: Laceystu

customer_reviews.title: The first mascara that doesn't cause irritation
customer_reviews.text: I have blepharitis and my eye lids get inflamed when I wear make up. This is the first mascara that does not cause a problem - I used to use Clinique but this is 100X better. I am surprised that there are no raccoon eyes at the end of the day. I highly suggest it and I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: noni

customer_reviews.title: None of the big name products come close
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I have ever used. Ever! Does not irritate, does not flake or smudge, goes on thick and lengthens, stays on until you take it off and feels soft. I absolutely love this product. I have been wearing makeup for more than 50 years and this is by far the most amazing product I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: It makes your lashes beautiful and full!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell you this is the 2nd time I’ve got your mascara and I’m in live with it!! I’m all about the small business as I’m a small business myself. I’m a salon owner with me and just one other lady. I have 5 daughters and I will be sharing or even buying them this mascara. It’s the best mascara I’ve ever used. We are always looking for an organic alternative, I actually found this by looking on the “ dirty app” So glad I found you!! Phenomenal product and I will be a life time buyer!! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Too clumps and thick.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use. Purchased the eyeliner pencil and love it, but the mascara left clumps on my eyelashes which I was unable to remove without removing all my eye makeup and starting over. Will buy the eyeliner pencil again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this product as it is all natural but it just did not live up to my expectations. I didn't like the brush design so that made application itself difficult. I wonder if I would like it more if it had a different brush? Hard to say. 2 stars because it is all natural, so they definitely get credit for that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 star rating - I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It took about a week or so as the mascara seemed dry almost at first, but now for whatever reason it goes on really well and I like it a lot! It goes on quickly and separates/defines my lashes really well. I wish I could rate it 4.5 stars. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because you have to apply it somewhat quickly or else it starts to thicken too much, but it is one of my favorite mascaras I have ever used. It comes off very nicely too, but yet lasts a long time while wearing it. I recommend this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Love product but problem with label
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but the label has started wearing off leaving a sticky residue every time I use it. This residue gets all over my hands and has even gotten black residue inside my makeup bag. I've only had this mascara for a few weeks. Product is great though!
customer_reviews.author: ashi

customer_reviews.title: Hyper sensitive eyes - so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised actually at how well this mascara stays put. It hasn't irritated my eyes at all - which is awesome! I already thought that I might never be able to wear mascara again ... Many of the "stay-put" mascaras come off in pieces which then gets into your eyes ... That is so painful / uncomfortable and potentially damaging to your eyes ... So I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sibylle

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! Goes on super smooth and even! Makes my lashes look amazing in one swipe! Literally this mascara is amazing! And the price being less than $23, is absolutely outstanding!! High quality mascara at a price you can’t beat!!
customer_reviews.author: krystle stolleis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Splurge and buy
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Love it. Been wearing this almost every day since I purchased it... 6months ago. My eyes don't feel heavy, or itchy. And the whites of my eyes aren't red from being irritated ( probably from chemicals from the regular store bought brands I used to use- which were just as expensive). Splurge. Buy it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Itchy eyes.
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised as a mineral hypoallergenic product but my eyes were very itchy. I wore it daily for about 2 weeks and i personally didnt see any improvement in my lashes. In addition, I didn't feel that it made my lashes look outstanding. Seemed to perform like a typical drug store mascara only much more expensive. This product wasnt a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tenecia

customer_reviews.title: Natural mascara that looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome mascara! All natural ingredients and doesnt smudge. My eyes are sensitive and it doesnt irritate them. I also like that it doesnt get clumpy and coats my lashes smoothly and evenly. The brush is easy to work with and iy doesnt flake!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: A terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mineral mascara! I have placed several orders for it and continue to be so happy with the way it lengthens and separates my eyelashes. I am 65 and my eyelashes are thinning. This mascara treats my eyelashes gently and provides such a good look. I will continue ordering. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Crouch

customer_reviews.title: there is no raccoon eyes and it brushes on nicely. I really like it
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are sensitive and dry. This mascara does not irritate them at all, there is no raccoon eyes and it brushes on nicely. I really like it! Skin2Spirit is a small company that does not test on animals and uses organic ingredients. All good things!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry, sensitive eyes, and most mascara bothers me. This one doesn't! It even makes my eyelashes look a little longer. The only downside is that it isn't waterproof, so if you cry or your eyes water when you yawn, then it can smear a bit. Overall, I love this product and hope it stays around for a while because I will definitely want more.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara after dealing with an infection on my eyelid. I needed something safe and easy to remove. This product does the job well. I sometimes have to use an eyelash comb to unclump my lashes but I had to do that with a lot of other brands before too. And it is easily removed which is refreshing! Overall it is a very good organic mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Val S

customer_reviews.title: It stays put, no smudging or flaking!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sensitivity to titanium dioxide, which is in almost all makeup. I have tried a few mascaras that do not have it, and have even experimented with making my own. Nothing I have tried stays put like this does all day. And that is difficult, as the skin around my eyes tends to be very oily. I have only used it 3 days, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: lois eyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for sensitive eyes & contacts no harsh chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara I have sensitive eyes and wear contacts all day . The mascara goes on well has a nice brush does not clump. It stays in place all day and you can remove it gentle on lashes. I love a product that has no harsh chemicals. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: I am having major allergy issues with my eyes these days and needed to switch to a different mascara. This one is a winner; it looks great with a couple of swipes, lasts all day, removes easily, does not smudge, and hasn’t clumped. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Charlestonmutt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Run!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the most oily skin EVER. Like wear waterproof mascara. I wore Chanel mascara. This mascara is awesome!! I had a buildup of waterproof eyeliner and mascara on my eye and got a face infection. Was on ABX for two weeks. I needed something more skin friendly. This stuff is amazing!! It doesn’t run.
customer_reviews.author: katl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mascara I have ever been able to wear all day. It doesn’t bother my eyes, doesn’t flake off, eyelashes stay soft, easy to wash off at the end of the day. I wear contacts and for years I have been looking for a mascara that doesn’t irritate my eyes or give me the raccoon look at the end of the day. It also doesn’t smell like chemicals. I’m absolutely blown away. I’ll never use another product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: It took a LONG time and a few wrong turns to other small towns, USPS issues, and I’m in Hawaii, the end of the road for mail, but finally got my mascara. LOVE! Works well, love it’s all natural, and not bothering my contacts. Super kudos to the customer service, for emails and laughs, and the ‘ real person’ on the other end.
customer_reviews.author: gecko

customer_reviews.title: Does not irritate eyes and last all day!
customer_reviews.text: My eyes become very red and itchy and burn like a chemical burn when I use other mascaras.. even the ones labeled "organic" but this eyeliner does not hurt my eyes at all! It's so nice to be able to wear makeup again!
customer_reviews.author: SparHawk65

customer_reviews.title: Severe dry eyes now reunited with mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this mascara for three days, cleaning it off at the end of the each day. Day 1 it was a tiny bit clumpy coming out of the bottle but I was able to make it work. Day 3 I put much less on the first application and that worked much better. I have not been wearing mascara for a couple of years, except to very special occasions. So far, I do not believe it is affecting my dry eyes! I was even able to apply drops without smearing.
customer_reviews.author: V. Weller

customer_reviews.title: I love this product, especially the mascara applicator brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Natural Mineral Mascara. I have sensitive eyes and found that many of the over the counter "drug store" brands were causing some burning and causing my already watery eyes to get worse. I also have tiny lashes, so I'm always trying new mascara to lengthen. I found "Natural Mineral Mascara" by searching for "sensitive eyes" mascara. I figured I'd give it a try. I am on my second order and plan to continue using this product! I especially like that when I apply the mascara, my lashes don't clump together, like other brands cause.
customer_reviews.author: tara baranello

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you have a corn allergy...
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is nice, but it contains stearic acid, which is a corn derivative. I guess it's better than nothing, I can wear it for 2-3 hrs before it starts burning. And I have yet to find anything sans corn (& minus all my other allergies). Still, I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JolanD

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: It clumps! Tried it many times, it clumped every time. Much thicker than regular mascara. Gave it two stars, because it is organic and non-irritating. I wasted my money, since I do not want to walk around with clumpy eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Hairy Otter

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes and ...
customer_reviews.text: No allergic reaction, which is why I purchased. Nice cover, but not a lengthening product. Arrived before promised. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Feehan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but hard to take off and smudges under the eye
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this mascara. It elongates the lashes, stays on all day, and doesn't crumble very much. At the same time, it does not make my eyes itchy or causing any other allergy like symptoms. However, it is hard to take off even with soap and water and smudges slightly under the eyes; thus have to wipe the smudges throughout the day. Would I purchase it again? Most likely. The pros outweigh the cons.
customer_reviews.author: C Bangean

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, I have very sensitive eyes and this does not bother me at all, also I feel it doesn't dry my eyelashes. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not bad if you can afford to replace it monthly.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product less than 2 months ago. I loved it at first; however, soon thereafter, it began to clump up. Also, from Day 1, after several hours of wear, it became flaky, flaking off and causing irritation in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sa Rah

customer_reviews.title: Good for first time natural buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good natural mascara it feels natural on my lashes If you wanna go even more natural just ad a bit at the tip of your lashes ;) For my first time buying a natural mascara it is very good I like it ..I just wish it was a little bit bigger tube.
customer_reviews.author: A-N-P

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a safe/non-toxic but affordable mascara and I LOVE this product! It goes on so smooth- no clumps! I’ve tried so many expensive mascaras and I can easily say this is my favorite and didn’t even compare to prices I’ve paid in the past!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a really good experience with this company as there was a small issue with the shipping of the product and I was excited to try it. Although the experience was really good with the company I cannot say the same for the product. It is very clumpy and doesn't really extend the lashes the way that I had hoped. Its not bad, its just not very good. Because it is too thick when it goes on you can't get it to give the length as it just clumps. I have not had that experience with other organic/natural mascara products. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara; with 2 swipes on each lash, I look as good as having false lashes. It's easy to take off, but I have been able to leave the mascara on and it does not get on my pillow. I always wash my face before bedtime and I have kept the mascara on and have not had to reapply the next day.
customer_reviews.author: JCalderone

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!! I found a mascara that hits everything that's important to me in a mascara. The ingredients are natural and organic, it's hypo allergenic for my sensitive eyes , cruelty free and vegan!! And on top of that it does it's mascara job. It goes on nicely and stays put! I'm very happy with this and would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: S.Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Great for very very sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. Its just incredibly expensive. That's my only complaint. But I understand why. I have sensitive eyes and wear contacts. Normally even sensitive mascara makes my eyes itch. Try it and it ads great length. Plus you can use it as eyeliner as stated in the description!
customer_reviews.author: Presto

customer_reviews.title: Great "clean" mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, though I think it's pricey. It works wonderfully on my lashes, stays on and is easy enough to remove. It does not irritate my eyes at all. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: King Family

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was a first time buy for me. I started having itchy eyes when I wore mascara. I tried several different brands and continued to have irritated eyes, so I just stopped wearing it altogether. A friend recommended I try a natural/organic mascara so I decided to give this a try. I've been using it for about 2 weeks, almost daily and I don't have itchy eyes. It doesn't smear throughout the day. Not sure how it does in water (swimming, etc). Goes on smooth, and easy to remove. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected actually amazing
customer_reviews.text: You know how you buy mascara that says it is clump free and then after 2 days of using it, it clumps on your lashes? I have been using this for two weeks and it goes on just like it did on the first day. It doesn't smudge or flake off. It doesn't irritate my eyes (I wear contacts). I love it !!
customer_reviews.author: K.R. Shen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Eye allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve recently decided I may be allergic to regular mascara. I’m so glad I purchased this! My eyes no longer itch and it is a great mascara. It’s very pretty. I do wish they would improve the applicator. It’s a bit too large.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Best non irritating mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: I ran across this mascara when I was looking for a product that didn’t burn my eyes by the end of the day. After reading the other reviews, I decided to try it. I had already tried all the drug store variety mascaras that were supposed to be less irritating already. This mascara is amazing. Is doesn’t clump and is easily removed. The best part is my eyes aren’t red and burning the whole day!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Osborne

customer_reviews.title: If you have a problem wearing mascara, you won't with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I quit using mascara because it bothered my eyes. I can finally wear makeup again. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mascara!!! I have super sensitive eyes and usually only wear mascara on special occasions. I tried this one and could not feel it, not heavy or sticky!!! Just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn W. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed with this mascara thought I was getting skin2sprit instead received naturlash its NOT THE SAME!! Way to clumpy messy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This mascara has changed my life !
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was very skeptical about this mascara after reading some of the reviews. I have developed an allergy to almost all mascara products including Clinique so when I purchased this product I thought I’d having the same reaction. Nope! This product has been amazing! After using it for three months there’s been no reaction no dry eye no pink eye or eye infection. This has product has enhanced my eyes so much it has even helped with the growth of my eye lashes! So if you are a person who has very sensitive eyes this product will work for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: All natural
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and comes off easy. No clumping. I like that it is all natural and there is nothing synthetic in it. This will be my new go to mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A hypoallergenic mascara that works
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara because I'm not allergic to it, or at least my eyes aren't. For thirty years I've fought with multiple mascaras and my eyes would always end up tearing up all day. This is a welcome relief for my eyes, goes on well, very little smudging, usually by end of the day. Would recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and natural
customer_reviews.text: Your product applies smoothly and doesn't cause redness or itchy eyes. (I have ocular rosacea and dry eye syndrone) It's the first mascara product with which I've felt comfortable in years.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Best Natural Mascara I Have Purchased To Date
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying the Physicians Formula for many years. This is almost double the price, but the product goes on well and I was really impressed. It’s hard to find a good natural product that does a good job like the mascara with all the chemicals in it. I will be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been holding off writing a review in the hopes that maybe the mascara needed to age a little to improve but it hasn’t. This is the worst mascara I have ever purchased! I was woo’ed by the fact that it’s “organic” but it’s not worth the money. There are way better natural Mascara brands out there. I’m not sure if it’s the brush applicator or the actual mascara but it’s super thick and goes on clumpy. I end up looking like Zsa Zsa Gabor before I do damage control and attempt to correct it. Really not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! I've tried everything from drug store brands to premium brands (even those that are supposed to be good for people with sensitivities) and all mascaras irritate my eyes by the end of the day and even cause my eyes to hurt. This mascara is amazing!! I can wear it all day long without any hint of irritation. Thank you, thank you, thank you! I am going to look for other products from your company on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: thisisme

customer_reviews.title: Great cruelty-free option
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of mascaras and have struggled to find a cruelty-free brand that I would repurchase. I'll be sticking with this one for awhile. Great volume and doesn't clump or dry out over time. I would recommend spacing out coats if you do more than one - Ill put on one coat let it dry for 2 or 3 min, run a brush through them quickly and apply a light second coat. The volume lasts all day
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara bar none
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I have ever used, and I have tried tons. I have extremely dry and sensitive eyes. This is the only mascara that does not make my eyes bloodshot. It lasts forever with no flaking or smudging, and creates huge, long lashes and does not clump. I am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Carroll
